data.event: The county was officially organized on December 14, 1818, and was named after President James Madison.

event.title: 25 years of age and older in Madison County, 68.6% possesses a high school diploma while 7.8% holds

data.event: Of adults 25 years of age and older in Madison County, 68.6% possesses a high school diploma while 7.8% holds a bachelor's degree as their highest educational attainment.
